data.name: Beasts Rampage
data.detailed_description:
In this adventure you play as a ferrous Knight-Wolf accompanied with mountable animals which will help you stay alive.
This epic game takes place in an old fantasy kingdom in which almost all the inhabitants are there to kill you.
This adventure has 2.5D style in which you can shoot your enemies in the background as well in the foreground, taking advantage of fully 3D environment and 2.5D path following plus a 3D shooting style.
Many creatures (dragon, beasts, Horses, wolf ) are your ally in this adventure, most of them you can mount and move through the 2.5D path. In addition to this, the Knight can convert to the Wolf to take advantage of his size and speed to sort out many difficulties they will encounter.
The kingdom has almost 20 nonlinear levels which you should known as well as your own hand. Many hidden level, skills, stealth kills and weapons are there to be found.
3 Magic Powers applied to each weapons: Fire Ice and Electricity power.
data.about_the_game:

This epic game takes place in an old fantasy kingdom in which almost all the inhabitants are there to kill you.
This adventure has 2.5D style in which you can shoot your enemies in the background as well in the foreground, taking advantage of fully 3D environment and 2.5D path following plus a 3D shooting style.

data.short_description: Forge your path through the unknown kingdom. Explore a variety of landscapes and caverns infested with vast monsters and creatures. Battle your way through and explore the kingdom in this 2.5D Style shooter-platform-fighting game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8750H CPU @ 2.20GHz 2.21 GHz
  • Memory: 16.0 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070
  • Sound Card: na
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8750H CPU @ 2.20GHz 2.21 GHz
  • Memory: 16.0 GB MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070
  • Sound Card: na
